---
title: ""
---



## Correlação

### Pacotes 

::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_474807a53d8d9c4c68dfdc04d7345afc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
library(AgroR)
library(dplyr)
library(corrplot)
```
:::


### Importando dados


::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_ed9cac6103c61310f386e39d80361e60'}

```{.r .cell-code}
imagem <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=373270992")
```
:::


### Visualizando


::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_329e4a4a91b1694c49f08e9c6d08b442'}

```{.r .cell-code}
imagem |> 
  ggplot(aes(Assess, LeafDoctor))+
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
imagem |> 
  pivot_longer(3:5, names_to = "method", values_to = "value") |> 
  ggplot(aes(method, value))+
  geom_boxplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
imagem |> 
ggplot(aes(Assess, ImageJ))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "ln")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
imagem |> 
ggplot(aes(Assess, LeafDoctor))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "ln")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-4.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Pacote agroR


::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_7d2b165073d303067642432f0766a62c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
imagem2 <- imagem |> 
  dplyr::select(3:5)
corgraph(imagem2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
        Var1       Var2       cor            p
2 LeafDoctor     Assess 0.9666367 5.972544e-42
3     ImageJ     Assess 0.9776918 8.143613e-48
6     ImageJ LeafDoctor 0.9797478 3.144091e-49
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor.test(imagem$Assess, imagem$LeafDoctor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Pearson's product-moment correlation

data:  imagem$Assess and imagem$LeafDoctor
t = 31.119, df = 68, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 0.9466882 0.9792005
sample estimates:
      cor 
0.9666367 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor(imagem$Assess, imagem$LeafDoctor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.9666367
```
:::
:::


### Pacote corrplot


::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_3056142dd3665eeeb403c5ba24e1a741'}

```{.r .cell-code}
cor_imagem2 <- cor(imagem2)
corrplot(cor_imagem2, method = 'number', type = "lower")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
corrplot(cor_imagem2, method = 'number', type = "upper", diag = F)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Importando dados do campo


::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_44b6bfc8aa53f3b0743fc86ae9ed806b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
campo <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=866852711")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_41f0237259babea6d85758075d16f186'}

```{.r .cell-code}
campo2 <- campo |> 
dplyr::select(3:5)
corgraph(campo2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
  Var1 Var2        cor            p
2  FER  DFC  0.9316978 9.864101e-15
3 PROD  DFC -0.6928161 1.110652e-05
6 PROD  FER -0.6258321 1.277444e-04
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='correlacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_8c6c5e333a4642cf4e88984cdc9584d4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
campo |> 
  ggplot(aes(FER, PROD))+
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](correlacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
